Detailed Description

A Request that creates a TileMap.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TileMapRequest::TileMapRequest (  const RequestData &  requestOrID,
const ServerTileMapFormatDesc &  mapDesc,
const TileMapParams &  params,
const RouteReplyPacket *  routeReplyPack,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
const MapRights &  rights = MapRights()
) 
 

Creates a new TileMapRequest which is inside another request.

Parameters:
requestOrID Id of the request or the parent request. Automatically converts from uint16 or Request*.
mapDesc A reference to the tilemapformatdesc.
params The parameters.
routeReplyPack The route replypacket. May be NULL if the route layer is not included.
topReq Pointer to valid TopRegionRequest with data
